title: i'll play a normals match to calm down
body:
client crashes 

takes 5 minutes to reconnect 

ended up 1v1ing my enemy graves out of lane and before i could recall to buy what little i could fucking xin zhao comes in and ganks me. 

near the end of the game i comeback from 0-3 to 4-3 on a spree and the graves asks if we're gonna surrender 

next person to piss me off irl is getting a fist to the fucking mouth im tired of doing the right thing.
